name: Beyond Truth
description:
If you want to know the truth, you must get deeper and deeper into next dimensions. Though, it's not an easy task as you have to solve the puzzles and make a good use of your agility to withstand lies of the game.  Don't surrender...

Genre:

It's a storytelling 2D platformer with puzzle solving fragments.  

Controls:
  • Jump - Space / W / UpArrow
  • Left - A / LeftArrow
  • Right - D / RightArrow
Software used:
  • Unity
  • Photoshop
  • LMMS
Disclaimer:
  • All the assets except font (shoutout to Jason NG) were made by me.
  • Main purpose of this game is to show that lying is bad, so don't do that :P
  • I will be grateful if you finish entire game, it will take maximum of 10min

Made for 7 days Community Game Jam by Michał "M4nus" Potakowski
